name: Dungeon Runner (itch) (squashy2)
description:
This is my first game!

I'm sorry if there are any bugs in the game.

--------------------------------------------------------

Welcome to Dungeon Runner!

In 'Dungeon Runner' you enter a series of dungeons which you have to escape from while being chased by monsters. 

On each level, you have to find the green platform in order to leave.

The exit is marked in Green.

Good luck!

--------------------------------------------------------
